page.title: 12Types of Energy in Beckermet
page.content: The main form of Energy used in this area is Electricity. Sellafield provides 10% of the Electricity used throughout the country. The majority of homes use electricity to provide heating and lighting. Cooking by electrity is common.Electrical gadgets, such as cleaners, food mixers, toasters and washing machines, are widely used. Oil is used by some householders as a source of heating. The Oil is transported by road in tankers to homes. Coal is used in some homes as a form of heating but this is not very common. North Sea Gas is not available at all in our area. The nearest town with Gas is 3 miles away. Calor Gas is used on the Caravan Site. Our motor vehicles mainly use petrol to power them but a few use diesel fuel.
